info.name: Fanpro - 0045 (Tumblr dashboard theme)
info.description:
Based on askfanpro0045's version of the character.

A Tumblr dashboard theme focusing on 0045 of Fanpro! Picture used is original design of character (which can be found here along with other designs: http://fanpro.tumblr.com/designs).

Part 1 of a series of askblog-related Fanpro dash themes.
info.additionalInfo: Should work on both Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox, but was optimized for Google Chrome.
